    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation()

    • Method Detail

      • takeOff

        public boolean takeOff()
        This method contains the take off command for an aircraft. The aircraft held in currentAircraft takes off. The next aircraft in the queue will then move into the spot. If there are no aircraft in the queue, the currentAircraft will contain nothing (null). If there was no aircraft in currentAircraft, false is returned. True is returned upon a successful take off. A successful take off lasts 3 time units.
        Returns:
        false if there is no aircraft ready to take off. Otherwise, true.

      • noAction

        public void noAction(int time)
        This method advances the simulation timer by 'time' units.
        Parameters:
        time -

      • getTookOff

        public int getTookOff()
        This method returns the number of aircraft that have departed.
        Returns:
        the number of aircraft that have departed

      • getNoWait

        public int getNoWait()
        This method returns the number of aircraft that have waited and departed.
        Returns:
        the number of aircraft that have wait and departed

      • getAcWaited

        public int getAcWaited()
        This method returns the number of aircraft that had to wait in the queue before departing.
        Returns:
        the number of aircraft that had to wait

      • getAircraftString

        public java.lang.String getAircraftString()
        This method gets the string from the most recently departed aircraft and passes it.
        Returns:
        The output of departedCraft.toString() is returned.

      • getNextAircraftString

        public java.lang.String getNextAircraftString()
        This method gets the string from the next aircraft to depart and passes it.
        Returns:
        The output of currentCraft.toString() is returned.

      • getCurrentAircraft

        public boolean getCurrentAircraft()
        Checks if there is an aircraft in current aircraft
        Returns:
        true if not null false if null

      • getTWaitTime

        public int getTWaitTime()
        This method returns the total time that departed aircraft had waited in the queue.
        Returns:
        the total time that departed aircraft waited

      • departure

        public boolean departure()
        Adds an aircraft to the queue if the queue is not full. If there is no aircraft in currentAircraft it gets placed there.
        Returns:
        true if aircraft is added, false if queue if full.

      • returnQueueSize

        public int returnQueueSize()
        This method returns the current size of the Queue.
        Returns:
        The size of the queue is returned.

      • clearQueue

        public void clearQueue()
        This method clears the queue. It will only be used by the testbed main().

      • getCurrentTime

        public int getCurrentTime()
        This method returns the current time.
        Returns:
        the number of aircraft that had to wait
